title: KEKOS Horses, Unicorns and Pegasus - Stylized 3D Equines
description: Create horses, unicorns, pegasus, and more with these high-quality 3D stylized PBR models (hairs, wings, horns, tails, etc.). Or use one of the 25 pre-created prefabs directly on your projects.
longDescription:
FEATURES

Build your own equine character with different models and materials combinations:

  • 2 bodies (11 materials: donkey, zebra and horse colors)
  • 5 hairs (11 materials with color combinations).
  • 4 tails (11 materials with color combinations).
  • 3 kinds of wings (Feathers 9 materials, Butterfly 5 materials, Bat 5 materials).
  • 2 horns (Unicorn with 3 materials and demon with 2 materials).
  • Eyes (8 materials with color combinations and crystalline).
  • Bowtie (3 materials), legs hair, and eyelashes.

Complete Rig for body and for facial expressions (mouth, eyebrows, eyes, etc.).

29 Animations ready to use. (video to show the animations)

25 pre-created characters for easy and fast integration.

Simple Character Controller in the Island Demo Scene (run or fly around the island).

3 Niagara VFX Systems: Sleep, Eat and Hit. [For some versions (4.20 and some later versions) you have to install manually the Niagara Plugin.]

Two rich detailed scenes are included:

  • Overview with all the prefabs and some animations that you can see at a glance.
  • Full island demo scene that you can play running and flying with one of our characters or your own.


ANIMATION LIST

  • Idle
  • IdleHop (for Idle break)
  • Amble (straight, left, and right)
  • Canter (straight, left, and right)
  • Gallop (straight, left, and right)
  • Jump Canter (with or without wings)
  • Jump Gallop (with or without wings)
  • Jump from edge
  • Fall
  • Fall Land
  • Fly Idle
  • Fly (straight, left, right, back, up, and down)
  • Eat
  • Sleep
  • Attack with front legs
  • Doble kick with back legs


❓ Have any questions or bug reports?

✉️ Contact us at contact@mameshibagames.com, twitter or discord.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • Stylized cartoon style.
  • 25 Pre-created Equines.
  • Easy to use to create your own.
  • Fully rigged and bones for face expressions (Eyes, Eyelids, Eyesbrows, Mouth)
  • 29 Animations.
  • 3 Niagara VFX for animations (sleep, eat and hit).
  • 2 Example Scenes (Overview and Island).

Number of Unique Meshes: 19

Collision: Yes, static mesh automatic and skeletal mesh manually crafted.

Vertex Count: ~15k average each character.

LODs: No

Number of Materials and Material Instances: 6 Parent Materials and 62 Material Instances.

Number of Textures: 97 Textures.

Texture Resolutions:

  • Albedo/Diffuse: 2048 for most of the assets. A few 4096 and 1024 for other parts.
  • Normal map: 4096 or 2048.
  • Metallic and Ambient Occlusion: 4096 or 2048.
  • Emissive: 2048 or 1024.
  • VFX Masks: 512.

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
